text:
Wysdom.AI | Senior and Intermediate Java Developers, UI/Mobile Developer | Richmond Hill, ON, Canada | Onsite | Full-Time

We provide enterprise-level AI-based customer care solutions, including search, chat-bot and other components.

We're hiring 3 Java Developers of different levels (Senior or Intermediate) and 1 UI/Mobile Developer.

Position descriptions can be found here:

https://wysdom-ai.breezy.hr/p/5e1e6dd337f9-senior-java-devel...

https://wysdom-ai.breezy.hr/p/e15968a985bd-intermediate-java...

https://wysdom-ai.breezy.hr/p/d7becb443ff7-front-end-and-mob...

All these people will work in my organization, if you have specific or personal question for me, email me to pavel at wysdom ai.
